verses.text: \w May|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* answer you \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* day \w of|strong="H4210"\w* trouble. \w May|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* name \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* God \w of|strong="H4210"\w* Jacob set you up \w on|strong="H5329"\w* high,

send \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w help|strong="H6030"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sanctuary, \w grant|strong="H6030"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* support \w from|strong="H3117"\w* Zion,
remember \w all|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* offerings, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* accept \w your|strong="H7971"\w* \w burned|strong="H7971"\w* sacrifice. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w May|strong="H2142"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* grant \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* heartâ€™s desire, \w and|strong="H5930"\w* fulfill \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* counsel.

\w We|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* triumph \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* salvation. \w In|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* name \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* banners. \w May|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* requests.

Now \w I|strong="H3068"\w* know \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* saves \w his|strong="H3605"\w* anointed. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* answer \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* holy heaven, \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w saving|strong="H3444"\w* strength \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w right|strong="H3068"\w* hand.

Some trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* chariots, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* some \w in|strong="H3068"\w* horses, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* name \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.
\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* bowed down \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fallen, \w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* rise up, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* stand upright.
Save, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*! Let \w the|strong="H6965"\w* King answer us \w when|strong="H5307"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H5749"\w*!
